Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Capital City in 1974...
Had first career hit on 6/13/1976, off Israel Marchand (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/31/1976, off Chet Steadman (SYR)...
Traded from Capital City to Gashouse on 2/12/1977 (Going to GHG: 1B C. Rael. Going to CC: RF D. Maser, P L. Esqueda, P R. Dealba)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1978, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 4/26/1978...
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 6/2/1978...
